com.centurylink.mdw.workflow.adapter.socket

Class SocketAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.mdw.services.process.BaseActivity
      • com.centurylink.mdw.workflow.activity.DefaultActivityImpl
        • com.centurylink.mdw.workflow.adapter.TextAdapterActivity
          • com.centurylink.mdw.workflow.adapter.socket.SocketAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActivityCategory, AdapterActivity, GeneralActivity, AdapterInvocationError, TextAdapter, Category

    @Tracked(value=TRACE)
public class SocketAdapter
extends TextAdapterActivity
    Socket adapter using soccom extended socket protocol

        public void init(java.util.Properties parameters)

      • openConnection

        public java.lang.Object openConnection()
                                throws ConnectionException,
                                       AdapterException
        This method must be implemented for PoolableAdapter
        Returns:
        An object representing an open connection. It is typical to return the adapter activity instance itself, although any other object (but null) can be returned, which will be parsed in as a parameter to invoke() and closeConnection().
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - retriable connection failure
        AdapterException - non-retriable connection failure

      • invoke

        public java.lang.String invoke(java.lang.Object connection,
                               java.lang.String request,
                               int timeout,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metainfo)
                        throws ConnectionException,
                               AdapterException
        This method must be implemented for PoolableAdapter
        Parameters:
        connection - the object returned by openConnection() and is typically the adapter activity instance itself.
        timeout - time out in seconds. Ignored if no response is expected.
        metainfo - protocol request data, e.g. correlation ID
        Returns:
        response if the underlying protocol is synchronous or null otherwise
        Throws:
        ConnectionException
        AdapterException

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection(java.lang.Object connection)
        This method must be implemented for PoolableAdapter
        Parameters:
        connection - the object returned by openConnection() and is typically the adapter activity instance itself.
